description.value:
Character with this can spend Full Action connecting Pistol or Basic weapon to bracing mounts on their arm, allowing them to fire without penalty. Gives +20 to WS Tests to resist being disarmed. Weapons may need to be modified (such as moving grip and trigger) to work properly.

Requirements

Might not be practical for all weapons.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
